CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . CHI walks in and looks at the toys on the floor . INV leaves the room
MOT sits down on the floor
CHI sits on the floor and picks up the toy car
MOT rummages through her bag and pays no attention to CHI
MOT turns to look at CHI
CHI picks up the toy car
<$=1> MOT leans over and looks at the toy car
CHI rolls car on the floor briefly and then picks it up
MOT gets something out of her bag
<1> CHI points to one of the car's wheels . <2-3> CHI points to the contents of the rumble seat of the car
MOT points to the spare tire
<1-4> MOT points to the spare tire . <5-17> MOT points to the tires . <aft> MOT sits back and looks at CHI
<aft> CHI rolls the car on the floor
MOT points to the other seats
MOT looks at the football and then up at CHI
CHI comes over to the jack+in+the+box and pushes the clown into the box several times
CHI pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
<$=1> MOT pushes the clown down with her finger

e.ga: put the clown in the jack+in+the+box

u.a: MOT tilts the jack+in+the+box back for CHI to look at
CHI pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
MOT tries to secure the lid but the jack+in+the+box opens
MOT fiddles with the lid and closes it
<3-5> MOT taps the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle and holds it with the other hand
<bef> MOT moves CHI's hand off of the top of the jack+in+the+box . MOT holds the jack+in+the+box steady for CHI
CHI gets stuck and cannot turn the handle any longer
<$=1> MOT guides CHI's hand in other direction
MOT watches CHI and holds the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle and gets stuck
CHI starts to turn the handle again
MOT takes CHI's hand on the handle and helps him turn it
MOT turns the handle hand over hand with CHI and then lets go
CHI grabs MOT's hand and tries to put it on the handle
CHI turns the handle the wrong way
the music ended its refrain and the jack+in+the+box didn't pop
CHI turns the handle the wrong way
CHI winds the handle the wrong way
MOT shows CHI which way to turn
CHI winds the jack+in+the+box and then stops and reaches for MOT
CHI pushes the clown back into the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown down but cannot close the lid
CHI pushes down on MOT hand
CHI bangs on the lid twice
CHI reaches out his hand to MOT
MOT sits back and looks at the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
CHI takes MOT hand and places it on the clown's head
MOT holds the clown down into the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown down violently
CHI bangs on the jack+in+the+box lid
MOT sings the pop goes the weasel song
the clown pops out of the jack+in+the+box
CHI holds the clown in his hands
CHI tries to close the lid but slams it on the clown instead
CHI pulls MOT's hand onto the jack+in+the+box and pushes the clown down with her hand
MOT doesn't sound like she's giving in
CHI tries to close the lid and then stops
<bef> CHI looks at the clown as he holds its head
CHI plays with the clowns head
MOT waves clown's arm at CHI
<$=2> MOT smiles and looks at CHI
CHI looks up at the door

INV enters the room at 09:51:10 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 09:57:10 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the slinky toy to hold
INV takes the Forbidden Object out
INV puts the Forbidden Object on the table and sets it into motion
MOT looks at CHI and puts her hand over his on the table
CHI reaches out to grab the object with both hands
CHI wriggles free from MOT arms
CHI smiles and looks at the object

g.ga: balls on the end of the object

u.a: CHI smiles and stares at the object
INV explains the PCI activities to MOT and then leaves the room at 09:59:35
MOT goes over to the desk
MOT takes the box from the desk and brings it down to the floor
CHI reaches out towards the box
MOT sits on the floor and dumps box upside down still concealing the ball
the ball rolls out of the box
CHI looks around the room . <aft> CHI looks at MOT briefly
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI looks around while holding the ball
MOT opens her legs and holds her arms out to receive the ball
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT catches the ball and rolls it to CHI
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
MOT looks at CHI and opens legs wide
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT pulls the large chair into the center of the room
MOT is attempting to get/hold CHI's attention while she prepares
CHI stares at MOT and the chair
MOT points to the other side of the chair
CHI walks to the other side of the chair
<$=1> MOT rolls the ball to CHI under the chair
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT catches the ball with surprise
MOT rolls the ball under the chair
CHI picks the ball up and throws it MOT
<bef> MOT catches the ball . MOT moves the chair to the side of the room
MOT prepares to throw the ball to CHI
MOT throws the ball to CHI
MOT smiles and looks at CHI
<bef> CHI throws the ball and hits the desk
MOT is agreeing that CHi almost caught ball
CHI throws the ball at MOT
CHI holds out his arms and comes close to MOT
<aft> MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
CHI throws the ball to MOT
CHI tries to climb onto the chair
MOT gets up onto her knees and turns the box upright
CHI has his back to MOT and examines the chair
<$=2> MOT touches CHI to get his attention and pulls him around to face camera
MOT holds out the ball for CHI
<aft> MOT throws the ball into the box
CHI walks past MOT and does not pay attention to MOT
CHI points up at the desk
MOT points to the box and looks at CHI
CHI comes over to the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT holds the ball out and gestures towards it
CHI throws the ball at the activities on the desk
MOT gets the ball from the chair
<5-7> MOT points to the box on the floor
CHI throws the ball at the box and misses
CHI picks the ball up again and throws it into the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box and walks towards MOT
CHI throws the ball at MOT
MOT throws the ball into the box
<bef> CHI runs over to the box . CHI takes the ball out of the box
< .1-1> CHI takes ball out of he box . <aft> CHI throws the ball at MOT violently and goes over to the table
MOT bounces the ball on the floor briefly
MOT has same intonation as last utterance
<aft> CHI runs over to the chair
MOT tries to stop CHI in front of her
MOT pulls CHI away from the chair
MOT tries to give CHI the ball
CHI pushes the ball away and goes back to the chair
MOT pulls the straps together on the chair
MOT puts the ball into the box
MOT turns the box upside down over the ball
CHI sits in the chair and tries to tie the straps
MOT pulls CHI off the chair
MOT puts the chair on the desk
CHI walks over to the desk out of camera view
CHI reaches out for the chair
MOT takes another box from the table
CHI is off screen at the moment
MOT puts the next box on the floor and sits
MOT puts the next box on the ground
CHI is still off screen next to the table
MOT pulls CHI over to the box
CHI crawls over to the box and bangs on the cover
MOT turns the box on its side
MOT and CHI open the box together
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT and then at the cover of the box
CHI takes the towel out of the box
CHI holds the towel close to his face
CHI puts the towel on the floor
MOT looks at CHI to get CHI attention
assumption is that still talking about non-immediate activities with the towel
CHI holds towel and looks at MOT
MOT takes the towel from CHI
MOT grabs one end of the towel
CHI holds up part of the towel
MOT wraps the towel around CHI
MOT rubs CHI with the towel
<bef> MOT throws the towel over CHI head
CHI pulls the towel off his head
CHI drops the towel in MOT's lap
CHI examines the chair at the table
CHI pulls the chair out from under the table
MOT holds the towel out to CHI
CHI puts the towel in the box
MOT picks up the ball box
CHI looks at the ball box
MOT points to the peekaboo box
CHI bangs on the lid and then stands up
MOT takes a box down from the desk
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI tries to open the box but cannot
MOT points to one side of the box near CHI
CHI takes MOT's hand and puts her hand on the side of the box nearest to him
MOT and CHI open the box together
MOT slides the box around to CHI
CHI takes a piece of paper out of the box and puts it on the floor
MOT moves back and watches CHI
CHI holds out a crayon to MOT
MOT picks up the lid of box and moves it in front of CHI
<$=1> MOT taps the lid of the box
CHI turns around and draws on the paper on the floor
CHI holds crayon out to MOT
CHI continues to hold crayon out to MOT
MOT takes CHI paper and puts it on the lid
CHI bangs on the box with the crayon
CHI bangs his hands on top of the box
CHI holds out the crayon for MOT
<$=1> CHI holds crayon out to MOT
MOT holds crayon out to CHI
MOT puts the crayon on top of the lid
MOT puts the box in front of CHI
CHI takes out some other crayons from the box
CHI tries to give MOT a crayon
CHI tries to give MOT the crayon
CHI tries to put the crayon in MOT's hand
<bef> MOT takes the crayon . MOT holds the crayon before CHI
CHI looks down at the paper
MOT holds out the crayon to CHI
CHI tries to give MOT the crayon
MOT looks down at her watch and then up at CHI
MOT takes out another piece of paper
CHI tries to return crayon to MOT
CHI holds up and looks at the picture he drew
MOT picks up another piece of paper
CHI smiles and looks at his drawing
CHI takes a crayon out of the box
MOT takes another piece of paper
<aft> CHI takes a crayon out of the box
MOT puts the paper on the box
CHI takes another crayon out of the box
CHI picks up a crayon and draws
CHI looks in the box for another crayon
CHI stops drawing and picks up the paper
MOT holds other drawings and looks at CHI
CHI pushes the papers off of the box
CHI takes a crayon from MOT
the paper slides on the box
MOT holds the paper for CHI
MOT puts some paper up on the desk
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI puts the crayons in the box
CHI helps MOT close the box
MOT puts the new box before CHI
<bef> MOT puts the other box away
MOT helps CHI open the box
CHI pulls on the box with two hands
<aft> CHI hands the book to MOT
MOT points to the cover of the book
MOT moves the book around to show CHI the hologram
